description: Ivan Dimitrov, 50, admitted delivering takeaway meals on the Isle of Man after a trip abroad.
title: Isle of Man delivery driver jailed for breaking quarantine rules
title_page: Isle of Man delivery driver jailed for breaking quarantine rules - BBC News
maintext: Self-isolation rules for residents returning to the island were amended on Monday, allowing those who test negative after seven days in quarantine to return to work, provided it is not a role that requires interaction with the public.
